item.title: Five Hops To Hitler
item.description: According to a fellow student, a general assumption exists, stating that almost no article on Wikipedia is more than five degrees seperated from the article about Adolf Hitler. To verify this assumption, I have analyzed the German Wikipedia and computed the shortest distance between all vertices and the vertex representing the article about Adolf Hitler. The result shows that 97.1% of all articles have a path length of â‰¤ 5.
